thread.title: H&M’s New Collection Has You Covered for Formal Occasions This Summer
thread.title_full: H&M’s New Collection Has You Covered for Formal Occasions This Summer

author: Lia McGarrigle
title: H&M’s New Collection Has You Covered for Formal Occasions This Summer
text:
Visit the original post to see all 9 images from this gallery. 
Brand: H&M
Season: SS17
Key Pieces: The black-on-black embroidered cotton jacket.
Editor’s Notes: The newest release from H&M’s Conscious Collection proves that sustainable fashion can be luxurious – long gone are the days when environmentally friendly clothes meant drug rugs and hem bracelets. The featured looks include a ruffled 80s-style shirt made from 100% organic silk, and suits made from BIONIC, a polyester comprised entirely of recycled plastic.
Shop the whole collection on the H&M site and in-store from April 20.
Find Out More In other fashion news, M +RC Noir’s latest pieces will add vibrance to any fit.
